detailsData.title: Flexible Meetings
detailsData.content: A virtual attorney is a great option for the flexibility of meeting in-person or via zoom. You don't have to go to your attorney's office and we are available at times that are most convenient for our clients.

detailsData.title: Remote Access
detailsData.content: We use case management software that can be used by our clients completely remotely. No more having to come in to sign papers or to make a payment.

detailsData.title: Experienced Representation
detailsData.content: Rob Calvert has over three years of experience in real property law and has handled hearings in circuit court assisting clients with their criminal expungements. Feel confident that your business is in the right hands with us.

detailsData.title: Personalized Service
detailsData.content: At Calvert Law PLLC, we tailor your needs and wants to your individual plan. Rob's goal is to zealously represent his clients and to help individuals and families through all of their legal needs.

valueProp: Welcome to our virtual law office
CTA: Call now for a Virtual Consultation
openHours: Daily - 9:30 am to 6:30 pm, Sunday - Closed, Major Holidays - Closed
